Review: This makes me feel way too deep. I can't even articulate
The rare kinda Hollywood film that I so much enjoyed
this movie feels life changing to me now...

Too many faces pass by; we are left with only paralyzing emotions. At one point, if we found the pain is unknowingly familiar, it’s only because it’s natural and necessary to forget. If life is a giant Disney land, your true love might not land in the merry-go-around, but the bathroom you run into over and over again. If that’s only possible, if there’s still a slight chance, what a romance.
the world before the world, the time before the time, the love beyond the love
Feel like my balls got cute off. So painful. Ready to kill a random person on the street, now I understand the kids
Life is so hard; having u is so lucky. Even if I m not here, u know u will be there with me.
